verses.name: 1 Samuel 12:3
verses.text: Behold, here I am: witness against me before the Lord, and before his anointed: whose ox have I taken? or whose ass have I taken? or whom have I defrauded? whom have I oppressed? or of whose hand have I received any bribe to blind mine eyes therewith? and I will restore it you.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 12:4
verses.text: And they said, Thou hast not defrauded us, nor oppressed us, neither hast thou taken ought of any man’s hand.
